puzzles.name: Shadow Whisper
puzzles.description: Angle the foyer candelabras until their shadows overlap to spell the whispered word.

hints.hintText: Align the candlelight so the overlapping shadows spell the keyword.

puzzles.name: Blinking Locket
puzzles.description: The heirloom locket replays four lantern flashes; press the buttons to match the haunted pattern.

hints.hintText: Repeat the lantern flashes in the exact order whispered by the locket.

puzzles.name: Portrait March
puzzles.description: Rehang the three gallery portraits so the plaques rise in chronological order.

hints.hintText: Swap the portraits so the plaques climb from the oldest year to the newest.

puzzles.name: Haunted Reflection
puzzles.description: Three ballroom mirrors show different scenes; only one keeps moving when the lights die.

hints.hintText: Only one mirror shows motion after the ballroom goes quiet.

puzzles.name: Ashen Cove
puzzles.description: Brush away the hearth soot to reveal the numbers that unlock the cellar latch.

hints.hintText: Sweep the braid of ash from left to right to reveal the etched digits.

puzzles.name: Echoed Name
puzzles.description: Listen to the chapel chant and write the final word the spirits repeat.

hints.hintText: The chant repeats its last word—listen until the echo settles.
